keyMoments.title: Crew Accused of Attacking Iceburg
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates are accused of attempting to murder Iceburg after Robin is identified as one of the attackers.
keyMoments.significance: This false accusation puts the entire crew in danger and creates a crisis that threatens to tear them apart.

keyMoments.title: Declared Wanted Dead or Alive
keyMoments.description: Kaku declares the Straw Hat Pirates wanted dead or alive by Galley-La Company, leading to a battle with the foremen.
keyMoments.significance: The crew becomes hunted within Water 7, forcing them to fight and hide while trying to uncover the truth.

statusHistory.description: The Straw Hat Pirates are actively sailing and recruiting

keyMoments.title: Foremen Battle Luffy
keyMoments.description: The Galley-La foremen attack Luffy together, using their various skills and weapons to try to stop him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Galley-La's combat capabilities and their fierce loyalty to Iceburg. The dramatic irony is that two of them (Kaku and Lucci) are the actual attackers.

keyMoments.title: Shipwrights Guard the Headquarters
keyMoments.description: Galley-La shipwrights act as guards throughout their headquarters to protect the injured Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the organization's loyalty and the transformation of their workplace into a fortress.

statusHistory.description: Galley-La Company operates as Water 7's premier shipbuilding company
